Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Oliver \Ol"i*ver\, n. 1. [OF. oliviere.] An olive grove. [Obs.] --Chaucer. [1913 Webster]
2. [F. olivier.] An olive tree. [Obs.] --Chaucer. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Oliver \Ol"i*ver\, n. A small tilt hammer, worked by the foot. [1913 Webster]
Oliver n : United States jazz musician who influenced the style of Louis Armstrong (1885-1938) [syn: {Joseph Oliver}, {King Oliver}]
